markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unending Emptiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3015) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 226 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101)

**Prerequisites**
focus pool; [Shadowcaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3009)

</column>

---

You pool the power of shadow within your eyes, gaining the ability to gather darkness into a turbulent orb of crushing emptiness within your line of sight. You gain the [_darklight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1060) domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Unending Emptiness
